page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: {Stelling Hall}Assisted{Community Home is run by the{National Childrens homes and offers places to 50 children aged from 2 to 18.They live in groups of 10 in 4 self contained flats and one house,set in extensive grounds.There is a large purpose built play barn that provides an opportunity for adventurous play.The children attend local schools(including a{special {school}for slow learners,maladjusted and handicapped children)and are encouraged to join local organisations like the{scouts. Families are able to visit and stay at weekends.The committed staff try to meet the individual needs of each child by providing sound physical and emotional care in a stable environment Emphasis is placed on the importance of each child being accepted as a person of value.
